dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4100 IH: ______ Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Chavez-DeRemer (for herself and Mrs. Trahan) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize a monitoring and education program regarding infections associated with illicit drug use and other risk factors.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the ______ Act of 2023.

section.header: Monitoring and education regarding infections associated with illicit drug use and other risk factors
section.text: Section 317N of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 247b–15) is amended—

paragraph.text: in the section heading, by striking Surveillance and and inserting Monitoring and; and
in subsection (d), by striking fiscal years 2019 through 2023 and inserting fiscal years 2024 through 2028.
